title: So tired of MMR tanking non-stop
body:
Seriously... I ask people if they need help, I gank other lanes constantly, I ward other players lanes, I encourage allies to do better, I offer advice, I try not to be toxic at all... and yet...

im constantly stuck with people like the brand in my last game diving a 5 man team then screaming WTF GUYS TEAM FIGHT... meanwhile he ends the game with 14 deaths when no one else has over 6.....

please riot... stop destroying my chances at ranking up because im stuck with people who just don't understand what this game is about...

my god... ranked is making me lose my fucking mind at this point....

3 games, 3 people saying "fuck it" in chat, spamming surrenders and feeding non stop...
